---

> **Security Issue?** If this is a security vulnerability, please do **NOT** report it here. See [SECURITY.md](/Docs/SECURITY.md) for responsible disclosure.

> **Please follow our [Code of Conduct](/Docs/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) when reporting issues.**

## Bug Description
Provide a clear and concise description of the bug.

---

## Proof of the Bug (Required)
Please attach **at least one** of the following:
- Screenshot(s)
- Screen recording (video)
- GIF

> Issues without visual proof may be closed without review.

---

## Steps to Reproduce (Required)
Explain **exactly** how to reproduce the bug:

1. Go to `...`
2. Click on `...`
3. Perform `...`
4. See error

---

## Expected Behavior
What should have happened?

---

## Actual Behavior
What actually happened?

---

## Environment
- OS:
- Browser:
- Device:
- Node.js version (if applicable):

---

## Additional Context
Any extra information that might help diagnose the issue.
